Package dataStructures

Class Aindexer<T extends IsearchStrategy>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataStructures.Aindexer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The search stratagy used by this indexing engine. Can be any class that implements the IsearchStrategy interface.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DictionaryIndexer, NaiveIndexer
    public abstract class Aindexer<T extends IsearchStrategy>
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class describing the necessary methods and common implementations of all indexing data structures.
